auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to continue to your wishlist
auth.registerSubtitle: Join VibeList and start sharing your wishes
auth.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.passwordLowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter
auth.passwordUppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
auth.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
auth.usernameInvalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
auth.displayNameTooShort: Display name must be at least 2 characters
auth.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

home.title: Your Feed
home.itemsCount_zero: No items from people you follow
home.emptyStateMessage: Follow some users to see their wishlist items here!

explore.title: Explore
explore.description: This app includes example code to help you get started.

platformSupport.title: Android, iOS, and web support
platformSupport.text: You can open this project on Android, iOS, and the web. To open the web version, press
platformSupport.text2: in the terminal running this project.

images.title: Images
images.text1: For static images, you can use the
images.text3: suffixes to provide files for different screen densities

darkMode.title: Light and dark mode components
darkMode.text1: This template has light and dark mode support. The
darkMode.text2: hook lets you inspect what the user's current color scheme is, and so you can adjust UI colors accordingly.

animations.title: Animations
animations.text1: This template includes an example of an animated component. The
animations.text3: library to create a waving hand animation.
animations.text5: component provides a parallax effect for the header image.

addItem.title: Add Wishlist Item
addItem.name: Item Name
addItem.permissionRequired: Permission to access camera roll is required
addItem.submitFailed: Failed to add item. Please try again.
addItem.parsingHint: This may take up to 30 seconds
addItem.parsingTimeout: Parsing took too long. Please try entering details manually.
addItem.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid product URL
addItem.pleaseCompleteDetails: We couldn't find all product details. Please complete the missing fields.
addItem.priceMonitoringHint: Add price to enable price drop notifications for your followers

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.emptyStateMessage: When someone reserves your items or follows you, you'll see it here!

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.pushDescription: Receive notifications about activity on your wishlist
notifications.emailDescription: Receive email updates about your wishlist

logoutConfirm.title: Log Out
logoutConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to log out?

errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You need to be logged in to perform this action
errors.errorBoundaryMessage: We're sorry for the inconvenience. The app encountered an unexpected error.
